Properties for Cameras

 
 
 

This page describes the configuration settings exposed for cameras in the eRnsT interface.

setting description savable?
Transform The properties in the Transform group define the position, orientation and scaling of the camera along each axis. These values are expressed in world space. Yes
Enable This setting has no effect for cameras. No
Background Color Determines the color used to render any areas visible to the camera that are not bounded by any geometry or sky lights. No
Vertical Fov Determines the vertical field of view of the camera, in degrees. Yes
